snippet.title: Fuego! Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/356100

In Fuego, you and an opponent create a tangled Mexican standoff one animal-bandito at a time. And when everyone’s got their mark, the bullets fly. You shoot a bank, you get the gold. You shoot a bandito, you steal the gold. Just make sure that when the dust settles, your gang walks away with the bigger haul. Even if that means losing a few friends along the way.

In bocca al lupo...

radiostatic.co/fuego
